insights.summary:
## What's Trending
*   **Authentic Personal & Founder Narratives:** Posts detailing founders' personal struggles, humble beginnings, and the journey to success resonate deeply, showcasing resilience and grit.
*   **Inspirational Tech & Innovation:** Content celebrating breakthroughs in deep tech (like quantum computing) and national contributions to advanced technology captures interest, positioning India as a global innovator.
*   **Values-Driven Entrepreneurship:** Emphasizing core human valuesâ€”humility, hard work, persistence, and teamworkâ€”as foundational to personal and business success.
*   **Corporate Recognition & Impact:** Highlighting company achievements, industry awards, and how these translate into client success and brand reputation.

## Recurring Angles
*   **Storytelling of Adversity and Triumph:** Presenting a chronological narrative of challenges faced early on, leading to eventual market leadership and significant impact.
*   **Connecting Childhood Lessons to Business Acumen:** Drawing direct parallels between life lessons learned during formative years and their application in overcoming entrepreneurial hurdles.
*   **Thought Leadership in Emerging Tech:** Positioning the author as an investor or advocate for cutting-edge technologies, inspiring future talent and showcasing forward vision.
*   **Emotional & Motivational Conclusions:** Ending posts with a powerful, inspiring message about persistence, belief, or the ability to shape one's destiny, despite humble beginnings.

## Why These Posts Worked
*   **Strong Emotional Resonance:** The detailed, vulnerable accounts of personal and entrepreneurial struggles create a powerful emotional connection, making the authors relatable and inspiring.
*   **Credibility and Authenticity:** Coming from established founders and leaders, these stories carry inherent authority, and their willingness to share personal challenges fosters trust and authenticity.
*   **Clear, Empowering Takeaways:** Each narrative post culminates in a strong, actionable message (e.g., "Persistence wins," "What you choose to do every single day does define you") that motivates and provides value to the audience.
*   **Focus on Universal Themes:** The underlying themes of persistence, resilience, humility, and the pursuit of dreams are universally appealing, ensuring broad engagement beyond specific industries.

ğŸ§  **Trend Label:** Authentic Growth Journeys

posts_analyzed.post_text:
1995: Launched Quick Heal. No one bought it.
1996: Couldn't hire engineers. They all went offshore.
1997: No funding. No investors. No bank support.
1998: Lost all developers. Worked solo in R&D.
1999: Dealers refused to sell an Indian antivirus.
1999: Approached companies for acquisition. Rejected.

Every reason to quit. Every challenge telling us to stop.

But then a userâ€™s feedback:Â "ğ˜›ğ˜³ğ˜ªğ˜¦ğ˜¥ ğ˜®ğ˜¶ğ˜­ğ˜µğ˜ªğ˜±ğ˜­ğ˜¦ ğ˜”ğ˜•ğ˜Š ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ğ˜µğ˜ªğ˜·ğ˜ªğ˜³ğ˜¶ğ˜´ğ˜¦ğ˜´. ğ˜•ğ˜°ğ˜¯ğ˜¦ ğ˜¸ğ˜°ğ˜³ğ˜¬ğ˜¦ğ˜¥. ğ˜˜ğ˜¶ğ˜ªğ˜¤ğ˜¬ ğ˜ğ˜¦ğ˜¢ğ˜­ ğ˜§ğ˜ªğ˜¹ğ˜¦ğ˜¥ ğ˜ªğ˜µ ğ˜ªğ˜¯ ğ˜®ğ˜ªğ˜¯ğ˜¶ğ˜µğ˜¦ğ˜´."

That was enough to keep going.

By 2010, Quick Heal became Indiaâ€™s No.1 antivirus.
For 15+ years, it has led the market. 
Today, its market cap stands at over â‚¹1600 Crores ($186M USD).

I donâ€™t care how long it took.
Iâ€™m just glad we never gave up.

To every entrepreneur struggling today:
Persistence wins. Keep going.

posts_analyzed.author: Sanjay Katkar
posts_analyzed.post_text:
I grew up here in Wakdewadi.
(during the '70s & '80s)

A chawl in Pune.
Tiny space, big dreams.
Five of us; my parents, two siblings, and me.
Figuring out life, one day at a time.

Life wasnâ€™t fancy.
Some days, no electricity.
Some days, no water.
Long lines for ration, kerosene, and milk were normal for us.

My mom?
She studied only till 4th grade, but she was the strongest person I knew.
Strict yet loving, determined to see us succeed.

We didn't have luxuries, sometimes not even basics.
Mom made sure we helped her with daily chores.
We became a team; siblings and parents. 
Dividing tasks, lifting each other up, 
keeping hope alive.

Looking back, that life taught us everything:
Humility and gratitude
Importance of hard work
Resilience and perseverance
Making the best out of limited resources
Cooperation and coexistence despite differences 
Adapting to challenges with a street-smart attitude

Years later, when Kailash and I started Quick Heal, life got tough again.
Money was tight. Frustrations ran high.
Sometimes we fought, argued, lost our tempers.
I still remember Kailash telling me:
"ğ˜ ğ˜°ğ˜¶â€™ğ˜³ğ˜¦ ğ˜¦ğ˜¥ğ˜¶ğ˜¤ğ˜¢ğ˜µğ˜¦ğ˜¥. ğ˜ ğ˜°ğ˜¶ ğ˜¤ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ ğ˜§ğ˜ªğ˜¯ğ˜¥ ğ˜¢ ğ˜¨ğ˜°ğ˜°ğ˜¥ ğ˜«ğ˜°ğ˜£ ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ğ˜¥ ğ˜¦ğ˜¢ğ˜³ğ˜¯ ğ˜£ğ˜¦ğ˜µğ˜µğ˜¦ğ˜³."
And every time, I would hear my mother's voice in my head:
"ğ˜•ğ˜¦ğ˜·ğ˜¦ğ˜³ ğ˜­ğ˜¦ğ˜¢ğ˜·ğ˜¦ ğ˜¦ğ˜¢ğ˜¤ğ˜© ğ˜°ğ˜µğ˜©ğ˜¦ğ˜³ ğ˜ªğ˜¯ ğ˜µğ˜°ğ˜¶ğ˜¨ğ˜© ğ˜µğ˜ªğ˜®ğ˜¦ğ˜´."

So we didnâ€™t.
We stayed. We fought. We figured it out.
And we built something together.

Today, when I look back, I realize:
We couldnâ€™t control where we started.
But weÂ couldÂ control how far we were willing to go.

Success isnâ€™t just about resources or perfect conditions.
Sometimes, itâ€™s about the grit built in ration lines,
the perseverance forged in everyday struggles,
and the promise you make to yourself;
to never give up, no matter what.

posts_analyzed.author: Sanjay Katkar
posts_analyzed.post_text:
I invested in a dream. Last week I saw it become reality.

Deep tech moment for me:Â 
When you stand next to Indiaâ€™s first Quantum Computer.

Last week, I had the opportunity to visit QpiAI in Bangalore and witness something truly special, Indiaâ€™s first full-stack quantum computing system, QpiAI-Indus.

Standing next to this marvel of science and technology, alongside Dr. Nagendra Nagaraja, the visionary Founder, CEO, and Chairman of QpiAI, was a surreal experience. It was the first time I ever saw a quantum computer in real life, and it left me in absolute awe.

Earlier last year, I invested in QpiAI because I believed in their bold vision and today, I feel prouder than ever to be part of their journey.

QpiAI isnâ€™t just building a quantum computer. Theyâ€™re building Indiaâ€™s quantum future.

With 25 superconducting qubits, QpiAI-Indus marks a giant leap for Indian deep-tech, showcasing full-stack capabilities across quantum hardware, quantum-HPC software, AI, and enterprise applications.

QpiAI is shaping one of the worldâ€™s largest quantum talent ecosystems, right from India. ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³

To all young tech enthusiasts: the future isn't just coming, India is building it. And it's quantum-powered.

ğŸ“¸ Sharing a photo with Dr. Nagaraja and QpiAI-Indus from my last weeks visit, a moment Iâ€™ll never forget.

posts_analyzed.post_text:
From my family and the entire Mayfield family, we wish you a Diwali filled with light, laughter, and new beginnings.

May this season remind us of the power of hope, togetherness, and the joy of building brighter futures at home, at work, and in our communities.

Happy Diwali to all who celebrate! ğŸª”
